page.title: 04THE JUBILEE CENTRE,BOLTON
page.content: The Jubilee Centre is a day centre for people who are physically handicapped. The people are collected at their homes and returned in the evening. Those who go do many activities in the craft or games rooms.When I went with the school recorder group people were having an indoor bowling match.Others were doing pottery and drawing.One man was doing the washing,some played snooker and table tennis.They also have a small swimming pool,hairdressers and even a little garden. The people who go do not have to take part in the activities,if they want to they can sit in the room watching television or just have a chat with each oter. Everyone seems nice and happy with helpful staff.
